name: 詹姆斯·富里诺
name_full: 詹姆斯·富里诺 James Furino

last_movies.title: 夜魔侠：重生 第一季

introduction: James "Jimmy" Furino is an actor, director, writer, and musician who plays the role of Jonathan in HBO's Succession - Finale. He wrote and directed Stealing Martin Lane, a feature film starring Dylan Baker and Isaiah Whitlock, Jr. He has written and voiced numerous national jingles, and is a leading commercial actor/hand model. In NYC he's performed stand-up comedy at Carolines and is a member of The Barrow Group Acting Company. His recently released album "Bootleg" is currently streaming. Furino is an alumnus of NYU, and lives in Manhattan with his wife and 2 children.
